panels.visual: Visual: Lightsword combines Smite with Healing Light, BOTH powers flowing together. Golden energy builds to blinding intensity. Characters: Lightsword

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.

panels.visual: Visual: Color returns to Starwind's wings - pure white, RADIANT. She stands tall, powerful, FREE. Characters: Starwind

panels.visual: Visual: Starwind bows her great head to Lightsword. A telepathic connection forms - her gratitude flowing through. Characters: Starwind, Lightsword
panels.dialogue: Starwind (telepathic): "~You freed me. I am Starwind. And I am yours.~"
